mapper.select: select C.com_no, C.com_name, C.com_owner, C.com_tel, C.com_addr, C.com_remark, C.com_registrant from bi_project P , bi_company C where P.com_no = C.com_no and P.pjt_no = #{value}
select cus_no, com_no, cus_name, cus_tel1, cus_tel2, cus_email, cus_rank, cus_dept, cus_remark from bi_customer where com_no = #{value}
